documentation.title: KoolCalendar-ClientEvents [Javascript]
documentation.metakeywords: php calendar,php ajax calendar,php date picker,php date time picker
documentation.metadescription: KoolCalendar is excellent PHP Calendar control that is features-rich, easy to integrate to web sites and simple to customize. Combining DatePicker and TimePicker, KoolCalendar offers special features like Ajax Capability, Multi-view, Quick month selection, etc. Last but not least, its revolutionary rendering using CSS sprites skyrockets its loading time.

property.name: OnInit
property.shortdesc: Occur when KoolCalendar is first initiated.
property.longdesc: Occur when KoolCalendar is first initiated.
property.samplecode:
<?php
...
	$cal->ClientEvents["OnInit"] = "Handle_OnInit";
...
?>
...
<script type="text/javacript">
	function Handle_OnInit(sender,args)
	{
		alert("KoolCalendar is initiated.");
	}
</script>

property.name: OnLoad
property.samplecode:
<?php
...
	$cal->ClientEvents["OnLoad"] = "Handle_OnInit";
...
?>
...
<script type="text/javacript">
	function Handle_OnLoad(sender,args)
	{
		alert("KoolCalendar is loaded.");
	}
</script>

property.name: OnSelect
property.shortdesc: Occur when user selects a date.
property.longdesc: Occur when user selects a date.
property.samplecode:
<?php
...
	$cal->ClientEvents["OnSelect"] = "Handle_OnSelect";
...
?>
...
<script type="text/javacript">
	function Handle_OnSelect(sender,args)
	{
		alert("Selected date:"+ args["Date"]);
	}
</script>

property.name: OnDeselect
property.shortdesc: Occur when user deselects a date.
property.longdesc: Occur when user deselects a date.
property.samplecode:
<?php
...
	$cal->ClientEvents["OnDeselect"] = "Handle_OnDeselect";
...
?>
...
<script type="text/javacript">
	function Handle_OnDeselect(sender,args)
	{
		alert("Deselected date:"+ args["Date"]);
	}
</script>

property.name: OnNavigate
property.samplecode:
<?php
...
	$cal->ClientEvents["OnNavigate"] = "Handle_OnNavigate";
...
?>
...
<script type="text/javacript">
	function Handle_OnNavigate(sender,args)
	{
		alert("Nevigated date:"+ args["Date"]);
	}
</script>

property.name: OnCommit
property.shortdesc: Occur when KoolCalendar is first initiated.
property.longdesc: Occur when KoolCalendar is first initiated.

property.name: OnDayMouseOut
property.shortdesc: Occur when mouse is out of a date.
property.longdesc: Occur when mouse is out of a date.

property.name: OnDayMouseOver
property.shortdesc: Occur when mouse is over a date.
property.longdesc: Occur when mouse is over a date.

property.name: OnBeforeSelect
property.shortdesc: Occur before KoolCalendar date is selected.
property.longdesc: Occur before KoolCalendar date is selected.
property.samplecode:
<?php
...
	$cal->ClientEvents["OnBeforeSelect"] = "Handle_OnBeforeSelect";
...
?>
...
<script type="text/javacript">
	function Handle_OnBeforeSelect(sender,args)
	{
		alert("Selecting date:" + args["Date"]);
		return true; // Approve action
	}
</script>

property.name: OnBeforeDeselect
property.shortdesc: Occur before KoolCalendar date is deselected.
property.longdesc: Occur before KoolCalendar date is deselected.
property.samplecode:
<?php
...
	$cal->ClientEvents["OnBeforeDeselect"] = "Handle_OnBeforeDeselect";
...
?>
...
<script type="text/javacript">
	function Handle_OnBeforeDeselect(sender,args)
	{
		alert("Deselecting date:" + args["Date"]);
		return true; // Approve action
	}
</script>

property.name: OnBeforeNavigate
property.samplecode:
<?php
...
	$cal->ClientEvents["OnBeforeNavigate"] = "Handle_OnBeforeNavigate";
...
?>
...
<script type="text/javacript">
	function Handle_OnBeforeNavigate(sender,args)
	{
		alert("Navigating date:" + args["Date"]);
		return true; // Approve action
	}
</script>

property.name: OnBeforeCommit
property.shortdesc: Occur before KoolCalendar commits changes to server.
property.longdesc: Occur before KoolCalendar commits changes to server.
property.samplecode:
<?php
...
	$cal->ClientEvents["OnBeforeCommit"] = "Handle_OnBeforeCommit";
...
?>
...
<script type="text/javacript">
	function Handle_OnBeforeCommit(sender,args)
	{
		alert("KoolCalendar is about to commit.");
		return true; // Approve action
	}
</script>
